title: 10 Web Design Trends for 2023
excerpt: Discover the top web design trends that will dominate in 2023...
content:
2023 is bringing exciting new trends to web design that focus on user experience and visual appeal.

1. Dark Mode Everywhere

Dark mode has moved from being a nice-to-have to an essential feature...

2. Micro-Interactions

Small animations that respond to user actions create a more engaging experience...
author: Jane Smith

title: How to Choose the Right Tech Stack
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to selecting the perfect technology stack...
content:
Choosing the right technology stack is crucial for your project's success...

Frontend Considerations

For frontend development, consider React for its component-based architecture...

Backend Options

Node.js offers great performance for I/O heavy applications...
author: John Doe

title: The Future of AI in Web Development
excerpt: Exploring how artificial intelligence is transforming the way we build and interact with websites.
